pre_install: if(!(Test-Path $persist_dir\skins)) { Write-Host 'No skins folder' -f Yellow; New-Item $dir\skins -Type Directory }
if(!(Test-Path $persist_dir\steamapps)) { Write-Host 'No steamapps folder' -f Yellow; New-Item $dir\steamapps -Type Directory }
if(!(Test-Path $persist_dir\userdata)) { Write-Host 'No userdata folder' -f Yellow; New-Item $dir\userdata -Type Directory }
